pulp_sample.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/python3
2 # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
3 
4 from pulp import *
5 
6 if __name__ == '__main__':
7 
8  # 問題・変数定義
9  prob = LpProblem("ex1", LpMinimize)
10  x1 = LpVariable("x1", lowBound=0, cat=LpContinuous)
11  x2 = LpVariable("x2", lowBound=0, cat=LpContinuous)
12 
13  # 目的関数
14  prob += 2*x1+3*x2
15 
16  # 制約式
17  prob += 3*x1 + 4*x2 >= 1
18 
19  # 定式化確認
20  print(prob)
21 
22 
23  status = prob.solve()
24  print("End status: ", LpStatus[status])
25  print("Obj function: ", value(prob.objective))
26  for var in prob.variables():
27  print(var.name,":",var.varValue)
28 
29 
30  pass
